body: I was just experimenting with the Set EP Zone Thresholds component and found that the Daylight Threshold input overrides the lighting power rather than setting a daylight threshold.  Screenshots of the HB component and associated IDF: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/zc7lfWIbrdZg*mVZ18OVveZ*rmkMOjasrthu6L4WrEU2PHCw--1rkEQwiM0JiLxl21FS55WdMH8nsjKjmhB9FUsXBUzzCbov/daylight01.PNG) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/zc7lfWIbrdb-lzpJrZPVvWh5pxVmDTzeAV*-ZIGlDdUV9ByOKtAdIAu4WENAMWWKDBcLFeW3Q8EwVg-1UeFS3c-vca34Yso4/daylight02.PNG)
